note.p: Death: Ridge, near Barnet, London (19 March 1799)
Career: British Minister at Venice (1773); helped finance the travels of Alberto Fortis (FRS 1795) in Dalmatia
References: Marta Cavazza, 'The Institute of Science of Bologna and the Royal Society in the eighteenth century' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 3-25, plate
Richard Hamblyn, 'The Stones of Venice', review of A Calendar of the Correspondence of John Strange, FRS (1732-1799), ed. Luca Ciancio, in NR 1996 vol 50 pp 241-244
